name: Lowe
description:
Lowe tells a story of a shaman trying to save their tribe from a deadly virus, roaming through the ancient forests deeper in the spirits realm through the mystical Lowe!

Keys:

  • arrow left & right = movement
  • arrow up = use bear buff
  • z = jump
  • x = claw attack

Game design: Raaste & Saara_Maria

Programming: Wilhu

2D art, graphical design & animation: Knowko & Saara_Maria

Music: nenemo

Wise advisor: Spazi
